alert.note: Alert for Adams; Fairfield; Franklin; Hocking; Pickaway; Pike; Ross; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN FRANKLIN, FAIRFIELD, NORTHEASTERN ADAMS, WESTERN HOCKING, PICKAWAY, PIKE, SCIOTO AND ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 130 PM EDT... At 100 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ashville to 6 miles northeast of Pike Lake to 6 miles northeast of Rome, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Grove City, Chillicothe, Portsmouth, Circleville, Wheelersburg, Waverly, Canal Winchester, Groveport, Ashville, Baltimore, New Boston, Piketon, Peebles, South Bloomfield, Kingston, Williamsport, Pleasantville, Bainbridge and Lucasville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Fairfield; Franklin; Hocking; Pickaway; Pike; Ross; Scioto
